title: The Missing Body Mystery
description: A mysterious man dies in Frank's confessional. Frank calls the police, but when they arrive the body is gone.

title: What Do You Call a Call Girl Mystery
description: A woman of the parish tells her fiancé of her call girl past and is promptly murdered. It's up to Father Frank and Sister Steve to discover if it was the fiancé, or perhaps a former client who killed her.

title: The Man Who Came to Dinner Mystery
description: Sister Steve's ex-boyfriend, Jack, witnesses a murder, but when the cops arrive the victim is alive and well. Jack seeks out Sister Steve for help.

title: The Mafia Priest Mystery: Part 1
description: St. Michael's hosts a priest in training, John, who's from a notorious mafia family. Trouble ensues when John is arrested for murder.

title: The Face in the Mirror Mystery
description: Someone is impersonating Father Dowling.

title: The Pretty Baby Mystery
description: A distrait woman leaves her baby at the church. Father Frank and Sister Steve track her down, but things don't add up when they find the woman and she claims she never had a baby.

title: The Visiting Priest Mystery
description: A very charming priest visits the parish, but right away Father Frank and Sister Steve suspect that something is fishy.

title: The Exotic Dancer Mystery
description: An exotic dancer confesses to Father Frank that she saw something that she shouldn't have and is murdered. Sister Steve poses as a card dealer to get clues.

title: The Sanctuary Mystery
description: Steve's brother, Mark, has run into a spot of trouble when he witnesses a murder! But can't tell the police for fear of implicating himself.

title: The Stone Killer Mystery
description: Someone is taking shots at everyone associated with the Gallagher trial from 8 years ago where Father Frank was a principal witness. But Father Frank isn't convinced it's Gallagher.

title: The Woman Scorned Mystery
description: Father Frank's twin is at it again. Frank gets involved when the woman his brother has conned turns up dead.

title: The Ghost of a Chance Mystery
description: A parishioner is being haunted by the ghost of her dead father. Frank, Steve and even Father Prestwick get involved in trying to find out who is terrorizing the poor woman and why.

title: The Falling Angel Mystery
description: A special visitor to the church is sure someone is going to be taken before their time, and it's up to Father Frank to prevent it. Frank thinks it has to do with a parishioner who owes a favor to a crime boss.

title: The Perfect Couple Mystery
description: A young couple's marriage is on the rocks, when the wife is sure her husband is cheating. She turns to Frank for help. But the husband swears to Frank that he isn't having an affair, but can't say what he has been up to.

title: The Confidence Mystery
description: Father Phil is over the moon about returning the Chalice of St. Sophia to Bucharest. Unfortunately, he falls victim to a confidence scam.

title: The Solid Gold Headache Mystery
description: Sister Stephanie is entrusted six million dollars in the will of a deceased parishioner. Everyone, including the man's family, wants the money and may be willing to do anything to get it.

title: The Legacy Mystery
description: Father Dowling has always enjoyed fine art, but someone is going overboard in their role as freelance art critic. A mystery thief is methodically stealing the art treasures that once belonged to the wealthy Cabot family. And Father Dowling has an inkling the thief might be the surviving son, Jonathan. The only question is why would a rich businessman take the risk of stealing the paintings when he could easily afford to buy them outright? And Cabot has perfect alibis for each theft. It looks like it's time for some of Father Dowling's old-fashioned digging for clues.

title: The Passionate Painter Mystery
description: The church has hired an eccentric painter to retouch the frescoes. He turns out to be an abusive drunk and Sister Stephanie has no patience or pity for him. But she and Father Frank must come to his aid when his studio blows up.

title: The Royal Mystery
description: It's princess and the pauper, when Sister Stephanie changes places with visiting royalty.

title: The Medical Mystery
description: While Father Dowling is in the hospital for a minor surgery, he becomes convinced that the person in the next bed has been murdered. While investigating, he uncovers a much bigger secret.

title: The Devil & the Deep Blue Sea Mystery
description: Sister Steve's brother is a target by a man who wants him to do something illegal. Her brother is run over by 2 men to teach him a lesson.

title: The Showgirl Mystery
description: Sister Steve's friend, is stood up at the alter when her fiancé dies on their wedding day. It is only then that she begins to discover who her fiancé really was. Meanwhile Father Phil has hit on the perfect fundraiser.

title: The Movie Mystery
description: Hollywood is shooting a new TV show at the church, in which a priest and nun solve crimes.

title: The Murder Weekend Mystery
description: Father Dowling is invited to a murder mystery weekend at the home of a famous mystery writer. Father Dowling's skills are put to the test, when their host is murdered.

title: The Reasonable Doubt Mystery
description: Father Dowling is serving as a juror, but has serious doubts about the testimony of a witness.
